page.title: 13CONSTANTINE ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: CONSTANTINE SILVER BAND.This was restarted in 1978 with some of the original instruments which had been loaned to Gweek and Wendron bands.MR. G.Goodall reformed it and it is now conducted by MR.E.Merton.Many new instruments and smart red uniforms have been purchased.The band plays at local events during the year. The band chooses the Carnival Queen for the Carnival in August.It plays at a carolare at Port Navas during the Summer and there is a "Brass On Grass" concert during July at the Recreation ground in the middle of the village. At Christmas,the band goes around the village playing carols.They meet for practice at the Parish Vestry,Mondays at 7.30pm and Wednesdays (juniors at 7 -8pm;seniors at 8-9.30pm).The band consists at the present time of approximately 25 members.
